author: modena
title: Great for little girls.
review:
I think I got this set from my sister, when she wanted to throw this away. It went great to my Duplo collection, but what happened 10 years later? Boring!

Pros

  • Lots of detail for kitchens!
  • The back of the box makes a screen!
  • Chairs!
  • Food!

Cons

  • Not much building.
  • Obviously, it's Duplo.

Overall:

Well, this set is great if you have a small child or if you are a small child. This set would probably be more suitable for girls. Boys might like the 1408 instead. 

Overall, this set will be great for small children, or for big kids making a Duplo house!
